summary: REQ-6 (swap the header logo to the user-provided asset, keeping English alt text) appears implemented in MauiAppShell.tsx. However, the diff summary also indicates several unrelated UI/navigation/icon changes that were not requested and may violate stated constraints/non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Navigation change: MauiNav now displays only the Dashboard tab and removes the Reference Capture link.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to replace the Maui Lane logo asset reference; it explicitly constrained not to change routing behavior as part of the logo swap.

hallucinated_features.description: Dashboard behavior changes: added state management handlers for deleting residents and toggling Active/Discharged status, updating KPIs/filtering in real time.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; out of scope for a logo swap.

hallucinated_features.description: Favicon/app icon reference updated to a v2 generated app icon.
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicit non-goal: "Do not change the app icon/favicon unless explicitly requested."
